experience: You and Victor both know Jason Patino, Joe Pierce, and 16 others
I had a phone interview last week where the interviewer said something like “So you’re the guy I am seeing on my LinkedIn news feed. It’s nice to meet you!”
Job seekers: Get out there. Embrace social. Network. Share thoughts and ideas. Build your brand. Challenge the norm. Don’t rely on applications.
Your services are no longer required.
Boom, it is like someone punched you in the stomach and it is hard to stand.
I have been talking to someone recently who messaged me for help, this happened to him after almost 5 years working at the same company which he loved.
He always kept to finishing his projects on time and under budget, he maintained safety without extra cost to his clients, and many times he was ahead of schedule and delivered beyond expectations.

Saurabh Bhardwaj is a Senior Instrumentation Engineer with extensive experience. Since he was laid off he has been looking for the right opportunity. He is open to relocation and currently lives in India.
Please like and share this with as many people as you can to help Saurabh find his next career opportunity.
You can reach him via email: bhardwaj.saurabh1985@gmail.com
-- Follow me Mark Sefaradi to get my future posts right away and help people like Saurabh --

• Results-producing Sales & Marketing professional with a proven record of accomplishment in business development, client relationship management, and team leadership; as well as, planning and leading comprehensive marketing and revenue strategies in support of business channel growth.• Develop new business opportunities through lead development, account penetration and relationship building. • Generate leads through prospecting and cold calling, both on phone and via Email. • Manage and Track the record of vendors and suppliers which helps in building strong network.• Research potential business and current customers with excellent networking and follow-up.• Ability to identify research and get to the decision maker and develop lasting business relationships.• Has handled staffing needs of Direct Clients and Tier 1 Vendors so as to receive ongoing requirements at the Client base and possess good rapport with them which helps in closing the positions and getting immediate feedbacks for the submissions.•	Responsible for providing best of the candidates to the clients within the minimum turnaround time.•	Strong experience in maintaining pipeline candidates and creating internal database.•	Responsible for checking references, negotiating terms and rates for each project, coordinating the interview process, extending offers, and closing candidates. • Qualify job descriptions and requirements with client hiring managers.
1832 Capital Circle NE  Suite 3, Tallahassee  FL 32308

•	Responsible for full-cycle recruiting conducting searching, prescreens, background checks, references and time management of all requisitions. •	Handling the team of 5 recruiters to cater the requirements delivering high quality professionals.•	Identified, qualified, and closed candidates through the use of the Internet sites, portals, database and referrals. •	 Interacting with vendor management in getting the jobs, coordinating interviews, closures, on boarding process like background and drug screening, compliance and time management of the consultants.•	Extensive experience with different tax terms W2- No benefits, W2- With benefits, 1099, Corp-to-Corp, H1B placements, and Green card/Permanent Resident placements.•	Filtered through and reviewed completed candidate profile/resume and evaluated applicant’s work history, education and training, job skills, desired salary/hourly rate, and personal qualifications against open requirements.•	Responsible for providing best of the candidates to the clients within the minimum turnaround time.•	Strong experience in maintaining pipeline candidates and creating internal database.•	Responsible for checking references, negotiating terms and rates for each project, coordinating the interview process, extending offers, and closing candidates. •	Business development by identifying new clients, onsite prime vendors generating business opportunities from existing accounts & develop them to achieve account targets.•	Coordinating with clients and scheduling the interviews for the short-listed candidates.•	Recruited and hired candidates in state and out-of-state for contract, contract-to-hire and permanent placements for all IT positions for multiple client companies. •	Responsible for mentoring and providing on-going training and support for new recruiters and serve as a resource for learning and navigating senior technical policies and procedures.

(C2C), 1099 or W2 basis.•	Understanding requirements as per client Need.•	Involving in resume searching from jobsites like dice.com, monster.com and Career Builder.com for various requirements.•	Sourced candidates through advertisements, Internet, candidate or employee referrals •	Manage applicant sourcing, screening, technical interviews, interview scheduling, coordination of feedback, and the entire offer and placement process.•	Responsible for developing and maintaining relationships with search agencies and contract consulting firms. •	Analyzed a broad range of technical resumes for specific skill sets, matching resumes to current and future job requirements. Involved in departmental resource planning and needs assessment.•	Responsible for implementing strategic staffing plans that support organizational goals. Sourced qualified candidates, screen applicants, schedule and conduct interviews, check references and backgrounds negotiate compensation, and hire exempt and non-exempt personnel in Information Technology area.•	Screening and Mapping the Resumes based on requirement and required skills.•	Submitting the Profiles to the assigned Team Lead or Manager.•	Communicating to the candidates and following up with the candidates till their joining.•	Working knowledge on Billing and Payment terms like net 15 or net 30 etc.

•	Responsible for full cycle of recruitment and end to end recruitment and Sourcing, Screening profiles through various job sites and internal database, networking sites as per the requirement for recruiting.•	Gathering the requirements from Team Lead and validating them.•	Understanding requirements as per client Need.•	Blasting the Requirements to Different Vendors, Google and yahoo Groups.•	Involving in resume searching from jobsites like dice.com, monster.com and Carrer Builder.com for various requirements.•	Shortlisting the resumes as per Client Needs.•	Checking the References for Back Ground Verification.•	Negotiating Rates with the Employers and Consultants.•	Screening and Mapping the Resumes based on requirement and required skills.•	Formatting resumes according to the client specifications & the standards of the industry and Uploading CV's on Client Portals.•	Submitting the Profiles to the assigned Team Lead.•	Scheduling interviews with the Consultants and doing follow up. •	Confirming availability of the candidates, and passing their details to the Team lead/Resource Manager.•	Communicating to the candidates and following up with the candidates till their joining.•	Interacting with the candidates, giving them brief about the position, roles and responsibilities, technical requirement and checking their positional fitment based on this interaction.•	Preparing Daily and Weekly Reports.

July 29, 2016, ricky reported directly to Victor

I have known Vasu(Victor) for several years now and during this time he has progressed from an excellent Recruiter to a very dynamic, effective and efficient leader. He is a great team player with commendable managerial skills. He was one of the youngest managers in the company’s history and he performed that role to perfection. His team building and leadership skills are exceptional. He was responsible for building and nurturing a very successful Resourcing team @ arRGee which has been able to deliver quality resources all the times under very challenging conditions. He possesses outstanding communication skills, great inter personal skills and organization skills. He is a very focused, hard working, sincere and an honest individual and highly respected by colleagues, employees, candidates, Managers and the executive team. I would strongly recommend Victor for any role which involves challenges, leadership skills, building and nurturing successful teams.less

Kavitha Katkam profile speaks for itself. I remember checking her profile when I first joined LinkedIn and I was surprised how many recommendations she got, simply she is an expert in her field.Few people have the opportunity to report to a manager who is also a coach and mentor—but I did when I worked for Kavitha."I was particularly impressed by Kavitha’s ability to handle even the toughest clients effortlessly.
